document.full_text: mohammed zawahri was one of 59 political detainees released thursday by the supreme council of the armed forces, the military-led transitional government, security officials said.
document.title: egypt releases brother of al qaeda's no. 2
lines_and_colors: mohammed zawahri was one of 59 political detainees released thursday by the supreme council of the armed forces, the military-led transitional government, security officials said.
